input.sentences: we walked through the city to see the buildings .
first we came to a statue .
then we building with a tower on the side .
we stopped to get a a better look at the building .
after that we noticed there was n't anyone else on the streets .
output.sentences: The ivy league buildings loomed under the cloudless sky, terrorizing Roland as he scurried across the pavement below.
Eve Regrets, a famous statue sat in frozen terror with a blanket of snow, beckoning Roland to consider did he invite Suzy to sin or did she invite him?
Spherical, partially covered in snow-- the look out tower--his fortress of calm; finally, he had reached it.
Longing to dangle his legs over the edge, underneath the black metal guard rails, Roland looked up to decide the precise spot.
Down below, cars crawled across the cold roads, melting the snow in all places, but the median.
